input.sentences: [female] sat at her desk | talking to her cat laying on the ground .
her husband looked over at her | laughing at [female] talking to the cat .
[female] 's sister called from the kitchen `` you glad you married this crazy ? ''
output.sentences: My aunt Pam wanted to talk to me so she sat, and I was still laying down.
She told me that she took in a stray cat named Pepper.
"He won't stop playing all night, Cate!"
As she continued talking, I looked over at Uncle Mike and just started laughing at the frustrated look on her face.
She was my Mom's Sister, and Uncle Mike married into the family which I laughed at as I hid in the kitchen to think about taking the cat.
